alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:17AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, southwestern Newberry, northern Edgefield, Saluda and northeastern McCormick Counties through NOON EDT... At 1116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Troy to near Hamilton Branch State Park. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Saluda, McCormick, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Saluda County Airport, Mccormick County Airport, Hamilton Branch State Park, Lake Greenwood, Monetta, Bradley, Silverstreet, Parksville, Ward, Plum Branch, Strom Thurmond High School, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Good Hope, Modoc, and Northside Fire Station Main. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
